CustomField.description: [Candidate for Deprecation] Formula field that associates a code with ampi__IATI_Transaction_Type__c. This does not get printed into the IATI Activity XML.
CustomField.formula: CASE(ampi__IATI_Transaction_Type__c, "Incoming Funds",1, "Outgoing Commitment",2, "Disbursement",3, "Expenditure",4, "Interest Payment",5, "Loan Repayment",6, "Reimbursement",7, "Purchase of Equity",8, "Sale of Equity",9, "Credit Guarantee",10, "Incoming Commitment",11, "Outgoing Pledge",12, "Incoming Pledge",13,null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Code corresponding to IATI Transaction Type
CustomField.label: IATI Transaction Type Code
